name: astrotomic/countdown-gif
description: Management system of internal notifications for Laravel 5.*

suggest.cache/filesystem-adapter: Allows to cache single frames in filesystem
suggest.ache/memcached-adapter: Allows to cache single frames in memcached
suggest.ache/memcache-adapter: Allows to cache single frames in memcache
suggest.ache/predis-adapter: Allows to cache single frames in predis
suggest.ache/redis-adapter: Allows to cache single frames in redis
